itunes:title: Fond Memories
title: Fond Memories
description:
Welcome to Homemaker Chic where we are rescuing the art of the daily homemaking grind in our red lipstick, no jumpers and a ton of great memories from Season 2.   Shaye dishes on the glory of dishwater blond and Angela swoons... again, over Lady Mary Crawley's wardrobe as we fondly remember our favorite episodes of Season 2.

CUE THE WINE MUSIC and GET A BOTTLE FOR A PENNY!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/pages/pennybottlelp?rfsn=2479198.660dce
 Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines. Dry Farms is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, naturally and traditionally made wines. We love them because their wine is delicious - it challenges and explores your wine palette in all the right ways - and their wine makes you feel good! As with all things, “better, not more.”
Angela was sipping an Austrian Blaufränkisch from the Carnuntum region.   A 2018 natural wine sourced from Dry Farm.   Let this wine age for TEN YEARS for maximum fabulousness.   This is a red bled of grapes from on sand, clay and slate.  Each 15 km apart.   Cool flavors and minerally.   Just the way we like it and we know YOU will to.   Give a Dry Farm subscription a try today!

Today’s episode is brought to you by:
Jovial Foods. Jovial Foods is a company that supplies us homemakers with the most gorgeous baking flours and foods. Jovial is most well known for their einkorn flour, which is a high-protein, weak gluten flour that bakes up buttery and rich.  Amelie made the a delicious Einkorn chocolate cake this weeked.  My girls love to grab the Einkorn cookbook and try new things. This is a company that has an extreme love for high quality ingredients which is why we welcome them into our pantries and into our kitchens. Visit them at jovialfoods.com and enjoy their free shipping!

Today’s Quick Tip for Your Home: Set the mood with music. Current favs: Django Reinhart, Melody Garot, Ray LaMontagne. Blast it!  Don't forget to keep that speaker charged.

Other notes:

  • Shaye's dress was purchased Cotton Candy Wear on Etsy
  • Our gardening inspiration is coming from this book this week!  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0847806898?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerch03-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=0847806898
  • Here's the game-changing garlic roller Ang mentioned: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B074R8RQQ2?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerch03-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=B074R8RQQ2

That's a WRAP! 
We'll be back in a couple weeks.   
Stay in touch on Youtube and Instagram!
@homemakerchicpodcast
@parisiennefarmgirl
@theellitotthomestead
Parisienne Farmgirl: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4P9zhII6woD8WriaQwk6bw?view_as=subscriber
The Elliott Homestead: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgUsMN5zOxCIU1L6MFNnh6w
